StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [PopulateDAFlatTbl]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS BEGIN --delete from DBO.RptDataAnalysis --declare @startDt date.me declare @AnalysisYear int declare @AnalysisMonth int select @AnalysisYear = year(getdate()) select @AnalysisMonth = month(getdate()) declare @EndDate date.me select @EndDate = convert(date.me, cast(@AnalysisYear as varchar(4)) + '/' + cast(@AnalysisMonth as varchar(2)) +'/1') --select @startDt = '2011-01-01' --while (@startDt <getdate()) --clean up any data for last month if there are delete from DBO.RptDataAnalysis where AnalysisYear = @AnalysisYear and AnalysisMonth = @AnalysisMonth delete from DBO.RptDataAnalysisBySrc where AnalysisYear = @AnalysisYear and AnalysisMonth = @AnalysisMonth
insert into DBO.RptDataAnalysis(AnalysisYear, AnalysisMonth, RecruiterID, OrgId) select @AnalysisYear, @AnalysisMonth, RecruiterID, Organiza.onId from dbo.Recruiter
insert into DBO.RptDataAnalysisBySrc(AnalysisYear, AnalysisMonth,OrgId) select @AnalysisYear, @AnalysisMonth,PSROrgUnitID from dbo.PSROrgUnit where PSROrgUnitTypeID = 4
select c1.leadid, c1.contactsourceid, c1.contactypeid, c1.ContactOutcomeID, c1.date into #Contact from (select leadid,contactsourceid, contactypeid, ContactOutcomeID, date from DBO.Contact ) c1 inner join (select leadid, min(date) date from DBO.Contact where isDeleted = 0 and ContactOutcomeID != 9 and ContactOutcomeID != 10 group by leadid) c2 on c1.date = c2.date and c1.leadid = c2.leadid
update DBO.RptDataAnalysis set TcActAch = rst.TcActAch, OtActAch= rst.OtActAch, AcActAch = rst.AcActAch, HvActAch = rst.HvActAch, EpActAch = rst.EpActAch, TcMade = rst.TcMade, OtMade = rst.OtMade, AcMade = rst.AcMade, HvMade = rst.HvMade, EpMade = rst.EpMade from DBO.RptDataAnalysis d inner join (select sum(case ContactTypeId when 1 then 1 else 0 end) TcActAch, sum(case ContactTypeId when 3 then 1 else 0 end) OtActAch, sum(case ContactTypeId when 2 then 1 else 0 end) AcActAch, sum(case ContactTypeId when 4 then 1 else 0 end) HvActAch, sum(case ContactTypeId when 5 then 1 else 0 end) EpActAch, sum(case when ContactTypeId = 1 and contactoutcomeid != 9 and contactoutcomeid !=10 then 1 else 0 end) TcMade, sum(case when ContactTypeId = 3 then 1 else 0 end) OtMade, sum(case when ContactTypeId = 2 then 1 else 0 end) AcMade, sum(case when ContactTypeId = 4 then 1 else 0 end) HvMade, sum(case when ContactTypeId = 5 then 1 else 0 end) EpMade,
year(c.date) year, month(c.date) month , l.AssignedRecruiterId RecruiterId from --select l.LeadID, c.Date, ContactTypeId from DBO.LEAD l inner join (select leadid, date, contactypeid, contactoutcomeid from DBO.Contact where isDeleted = 0) c on l.LeadId = c.LeadId where c.date between dateadd(month, -3, @EndDate) and getdate() group by l.AssignedRecruiterId, year(c.date), month(c.date)) rst on rst.Year = AnalysisYear and rst.month = AnalysisMonth and rst.RecruiterId = d.RecruiterId
update DBO.RptDataAnalysis set TcAppt = rst.TcAppt, OtAppt = rst.OtAppt, AcAppt = rst.AcAppt, HvAppt = rst.HvAppt, EpAppt = rst.EpAppt from DBO.RptDataAnalysis d inner join (select sum(case ContactTypeId when 1 then 1 else 0 end) TcAppt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 3 then 1 else 0 end) OtAppt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 2 then 1 else 0 end) AcAppt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 4 then 1 else 0 end) HvAppt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 5 then 1 else 0 end) EpAppt, year(ci.StartDateTime) year, month(ci.StartDateTime) month, l.AssignedRecruiterId RecruiterId from DBO.LEAD l inner join #Contact c on l.LeadId = c.LeadId --and c.isDeleted = 0 inner join DBO.ScheduledEvent e on l.LeadId = e.LeadID inner join DBO.CalendarItem ci on ci.CalendarItemID = e.CalendarItemEventID where e.ScheduledEventTypeId = 1 and ci.StartDateTime between dateadd(month, -3, @EndDate) and getdate() group by l.AssignedRecruiterId, year(ci.StartDateTime), month(ci.StartDateTime)) rst on rst.Year = AnalysisYear and rst.month = AnalysisMonth and rst.RecruiterId = d.RecruiterId
update DBO.RptDataAnalysis set TcInt = rst.TcInt, OtInt = rst.OtInt, AcInt = rst.AcInt, HvInt = rst.HvInt, EpInt = rst.EpInt from DBO.RptDataAnalysis d inner join (select sum(case ContactTypeId when 1 then 1 else 0 end) TcInt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 3 then 1 else 0 end) OtInt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 2 then 1 else 0 end) AcInt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 4 then 1 else 0 end) HvInt, sum(case ContactTypeId when 5 then 1 else 0 end) EpInt, year(ci.StartDateTime) year, month(ci.StartDateTime) month, l.AssignedRecruiterId RecruiterId from DBO.LEAD l inner join #Contact c on l.LeadId = c.LeadId --and c.isDeleted = 0 inner join DBO.ScheduledEvent e on l.LeadId = e.LeadID inner join DBO.CalendarItem ci on ci.CalendarItemID = e.CalendarItemEventID where e.ScheduledEventTypeId = 2 and ci.StartDateTime between dateadd(month, -3, @EndDate) and getdate() group by l.AssignedRecruiterId, year(ci.StartDateTime), month(ci.StartDateTime)) rst on rst.Year = AnalysisYear and rst.month = AnalysisMonth and rst.RecruiterId = d.RecruiterId
update DBO.RptDataAnalysis set --Nwa = rst.Nwa, TcJoin = rst.TcJoin, OtJoin = rst.OtJoin, AcJoin = rst.AcJoin, HvJoin = rst.HvJoin, EpJoin = rst.EpJoin from DBO.RptDataAnalysis d inner join (select sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactypeid = 1 then 1 else 0 end) TcJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactypeid = 3 then 1 else 0 end) OtJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactypeid = 2 then 1 else 0 end) AcJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactypeid = 4 then 1 else 0 end) HvJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactypeid = 5 then 1 else 0 end) EpJoin, year(ld.DateUpdated) year, month(ld.DateUpdated) month, l.AssignedRecruiterId RecruiterId from DBO.LEAD l inner join #Contact c on l.LeadId = c.LeadId --and c.isDeleted = 0 inner join DBO.LeadStatusDisposi.on ld on ld.LeadID = l.LeadId inner join DBO.StatusDisposi.on sd on ld.StatusDisposi.onID = sd.StatusDisposi.onID inner join DBO.Status s on s.StatusID = sd.StatusID where ld.DateUpdated between dateadd(month, -3, @EndDate) and getdate() group by l.AssignedRecruiterId, year(ld.DateUpdated), month(ld.DateUpdated)) rst on rst.Year = AnalysisYear and rst.month = AnalysisMonth and rst.RecruiterId = d.RecruiterId
update DBO.RptDataAnalysis set Nwa = rst.Nwa, Contract = rst.Contract from DBO.RptDataAnalysis d inner join (select sum(case s.StatusID when 5 then 1 else 0 end) Nwa, sum(case s.StatusID when 6 then 1 else 0 end) Contract, year(ld.DateUpdated) year, month(ld.DateUpdated) month, l.AssignedRecruiterId RecruiterId from DBO.LEAD l inner join #Contact c on l.LeadId = c.LeadId --and c.isDeleted = 0 inner join DBO.LeadStatusDisposi.on ld on ld.LeadID = l.LeadId inner join DBO.StatusDisposi.on sd on ld.StatusDisposi.onID = sd.StatusDisposi.onID inner join DBO.Status s on s.StatusID = sd.StatusID where ld.DateUpdated between dateadd(month, -3, @EndDate) and getdate() group by l.AssignedRecruiterId, year(ld.DateUpdated), month(ld.DateUpdated)) rst on rst.Year = AnalysisYear and rst.month = AnalysisMonth and rst.RecruiterId = d.RecruiterId
--Update RptDataAnalysisBySrc table update DBO.RptDataAnalysisBySrc set [LISJoin] =rst.[LISJoin], [WKIJoin] =rst.[WKIJoin], [CALJoin] =rst.[CALJoin], [QLDJoin] =rst.[QLDJoin], [IRRJoin] =rst.[IRRJoin], [PWSJoin] =rst.[PWSJoin], [TRAJoin] =rst.[TRAJoin], [SEPJoin] =rst.[SEPJoin], [MCRJoin] =rst.[MCRJoin], [EACJoin] =rst.[EACJoin], [SNSJoin] =rst.[SNSJoin], [NPSJoin] =rst.[NPSJoin], [RCRJoin] =rst.[RCRJoin], [EMLJoin] =rst.[EMLJoin], [OTHJoin] =rst.[OTHJoin]
from DBO.RptDataAnalysisBySrc ds inner join (select sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 1 then 1 else 0 end) LISJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 2 then 1 else 0 end) WKIJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 3 then 1 else 0 end) CALJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 4 then 1 else 0 end) QLDJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 5 then 1 else 0 end) IRRJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 6 then 1 else 0 end) PWSJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 7 then 1 else 0 end) TRAJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 8 then 1 else 0 end) SEPJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 9 then 1 else 0 end) MCRJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 10 then 1 else 0 end) EACJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 11 then 1 else 0 end) SNSJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 12 then 1 else 0 end) NPSJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 13 then 1 else 0 end) RCRJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 14 then 1 else 0 end) EMLJoin, sum(case when s.StatusID = 6 and contactsourceid = 15 then 1 else 0 end) OTHJoin, year(ld.DateUpdated) year, month(ld.DateUpdated) month, r.Organiza.onID from DBO.LEAD l inner join #Contact c on l.LeadId = c.LeadId --and c.isDeleted = 0 inner join DBO.LeadStatusDisposi.on ld on ld.LeadID = l.LeadId inner join DBO.StatusDisposi.on sd on ld.StatusDisposi.onID = sd.StatusDisposi.onID inner join DBO.Status s on s.StatusID = sd.StatusID inner join dbo.Recruiter r on l.AssignedRecruiterId = r.RecruiterId where ld.DateUpdated between dateadd(month, -3, @EndDate) and getdate() group by r.Organiza.onID, year(ld.DateUpdated), month(ld.DateUpdated)) rst on rst.Year = AnalysisYear and rst.month = AnalysisMonth and rst.Organiza.onID = ds.OrgId
drop table #Contact
END
